long_description: The sturdy Kurgo Collaps-A-Bowl lets you pack it, pop it and pour it for your pooch. A 2009 award winner from Dog Fancy magazine, this bowl makes water on the go a cinch. Made with BPA-free, food-grade silicone, the Collaps-A-Bowl holds 24 fl. oz. Accordion design collapses to an inch thick for easy transport in your car or pack. Dishwasher safe for easy cleaning at home.
short_description: The sturdy Kurgo Collaps-A-Bowl lets you pack it, pop it and pour it for your pooch. A 2009 award winner from Dog Fancy magazine, this bowl makes water on the go a cinch.
